name: Tapeworm Tangle
description:
The objective is to eat as much worm food as possible.

Click the button in the lower right to make the game full-screen and press ESC to exit full screen. If the controls don't respond, try clicking on the game. Sometimes the window is unfocused.

Multiplayer

The game is CO-OP so try to get as big of a score as possible without hitting each other! A separate high score is saved depending on the number of worms playing.

4- Player matches require at least 2 controllers. You can play with 2 controllers and 2 people on a keyboard or all 4 players can use controllers.

Music Attribution

Background music from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
